segments.text: I really do like this dining set.But I just don't know . I don't know if I can do a good job with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It really isn't hard , sir . You just have to follow the instructions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What instructions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will give you a detailed instruction manual if you buy the table .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . But can I understand the instructions ? I'm a foreigner , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about that . Your English seems very good.And our instruction manuals are very clearly written . It's easy !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me now some of the things I need to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course.First , you must sand the furniture . You sand it to make the wood smooth.You start with heavy-grade sandpaper . Then , you move to finer-grade sandpaper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I have to sand every inch of the table ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The better you sand it , the better the finish will be .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , after you sand it , you use tack cloth to wipe off any dust or sawdust .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sawdust ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sawdust is the tiny particles of wood.You could call it wood dust . You must wipe it off.The wood should be very clean before you put the varnish on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That makes sense .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then you apply the varnish , which is very easy . It is like painting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I can choose any color ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we have many colors to choose from , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And after the varnish ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: After the varnish dries for 24 hours , you can put another coat of varnish on . Or you can put the finish on.The finish is hard and clear . It goes on top of the varnish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , when the finish is dry , the table is done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It all sounds very complicated .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It only sounds complicated . It's really very easy . A lot of people here in America finish their own furniture.It ' s a good way to save some money . And a lot of people even enjoy it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I will look around your shop some more . I need to think about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
